Html:
what i would see added as option is to have some sort of filters for:
1.gems -so you can add what gems you want to use on all items-it would shorten upgrade list considerbly
2.upgrades available-so you can sort what instance you can go-for example -what good to see that you can upgrade your gear from Sunwell drop and yet you cant raid it
These things are being worked on, they're just a ways off due to lacking the necessary data from the armor (or wowhead/wowdb).
